TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TextFieldParser extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供分析结构化文本文件的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TextFieldParser`对象提供的方法和属性，用于分析结构化文本文件。The `TextFieldParser` object provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files. 分析的文本文件`TextFieldParser`类似于循环访问文本文件，而`ReadFields`要提取文本字段的方法是类似于拆分字符串。Parsing a text file with the `TextFieldParser` is similar to iterating over a text file, while the `ReadFields` method to extract fields of text is similar to splitting the strings. `TextFieldParser`可以分析两种类型的文件： 分隔符或固定宽度。The `TextFieldParser` can parse two types of files: delimited or fixed-width. 某些属性，如`Delimiters`并`HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes`才有意义时使用的带分隔符的文件，而`FieldWidths`属性才有意义的仅当使用固定宽度文件时。Some properties, such as `Delimiters` and `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` are meaningful only when working with delimited files, while the `FieldWidths` property is meaningful only when working with fixed-width files. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |读取定宽文本文件Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |读取具有多种格式的文本文件Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例分析以制表符分隔的文本文件， `Bigfile`。This example parses through a tab-delimited text file, `Bigfile`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新`TextFieldParser`对象，若要分析的文件或流的所表示`stream`参数。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符和检索个不同的区域性设置这些相同的字符时，字符可能无法解释和可能会导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextFieldParser (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Text.Encoding defaultEncoding, bool detectEncoding);
.method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Text.Encoding defaultEncoding, bool detectEncoding) cil managed
public: TextFieldParser(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Text::Encoding ^ defaultEncoding, bool detectEncoding);

span.span: The stream to be parsed.

param.name: defaultEncoding
param.span: 在无法从文件确定编码时要使用的字符编码。

span.span: The character encoding to use if encoding is not determined from file.
Default is .

param.name: detectEncoding
param.span: 指示是否在文件头查找字节顺序标记。

span.span: Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the file.
Default is .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新`TextFieldParser`对象，若要分析的文件或流的所表示`stream`参数。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. 如果`detectEncoding`参数是`True`，此构造函数将尝试检测编码，方法是查看的文件或流的第三个字节。If the `detectEncoding` parameter is `True`, this constructor attempts to detect the encoding by looking at the first three bytes of the file or stream. 如果在文件开头相应的字节顺序标记，则会自动识别了 utf-8、 小 endian Unicode 和 big endian Unicode 文本。It automatically recognizes UTF-8, little-endian Unicode, and big-endian Unicode text if the file starts with the appropriate byte-order marks. 否则，指定编码由`defaultEncoding`使用。Otherwise, the encoding specified by `defaultEncoding` is used. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符和检索个不同的区域性设置这些相同的字符时，字符可能无法解释和可能会导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: or is .
cannot be read from.

get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 定义注释标记。

span.span: Defines comment tokens.

summary.span: 注释标记是一个字符串，当位于行首时，指示该行是一个注释并且分析器应该忽略该行。

span.span: A comment token is a string that, when placed at the beginning of a line, indicates that the line is a comment and should be ignored by the parser.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，它包含 对象的所有注释标记。

span.span: A string array that contains all of the comment tokens for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 长度为零的注释标记将被忽略。Zero-length comment tokens are ignored. ## Examples 此示例指定，对于`TextFieldParser`，`FileReader`应忽略以单引号 （'）。This example specifies that for the `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader` lines beginning with a single quotation mark (') should be ignored. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

span.span: A comment token includes white space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才有意义才属性设置为`FieldType.Delimited`。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.Delimited`. 定义分隔符的文本文件也可以使用方法。Defining the delimiters for a text file can also be accomplished with the method. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`Delimiters`属性。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `Delimiters` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例中指定的分隔符`TextFieldParser`对象， `FileReader`，为逗号 （，）。This example specifies that the delimiter for the `TextFieldParser` object, `FileReader`, is a comma (,). [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于从文件读取数据时确定读取的数据的末尾。This property can be used when reading from files to determine the end of the data being read. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`EndOfData`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `EndOfData` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文件中读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用`EndofData`属性来循环访问与文件中的所有字段`TextFieldReader`， `FileReader`。This example uses the `EndofData` property to loop through all the fields in the file with the `TextFieldReader`, `FileReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 返回导致最近发生的 异常的行。

span.span: Returns the line that caused the most recent exception.

value.span: 导致最近发生的 异常的行。

span.span: The line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有已抛出异常，则返回一个空字符串。If no exceptions have been thrown, an empty string is returned. 属性可以用于显示导致异常的行数。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`ErrorLine`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLine` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文件中读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用`ErrorLine`属性来显示导致发生当前的行异常。This example uses the `ErrorLine` property to display the line causing the current exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: The number of the line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有已抛出异常，则返回-1。If no exceptions have been thrown, -1 is returned. 属性可以用于显示导致异常的行数。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 确定的行号时，不忽略空白行和提出的意见。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`ErrorLineNumber`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLineNumber` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文件中读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用`ErrorLineNumber`属性来显示导致当前行位置异常。This example uses the `ErrorLineNumber` property to display the location of the line causing the current exception. member this.FieldWidths : int[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 表示正在分析的文本文件中每一列的宽度。

span.span: Denotes the width of each column in the text file being parsed.

value.span: 一个整数数组，它包含正在分析的文本文件中每一列的宽度。

span.span: An integer array that contains the width of each column in the text file that is being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才有意义才属性设置为`FieldType.FixedWidth`。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.FixedWidth`. 如果数组中的最后一项小于或等于零，则假定字段为可变宽度。If the last entry in the array is less than or equal to zero, the field is assumed to be of variable width. 方法还可用于设置字段宽度。The method can also be used to set field widths. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`FieldWidths`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `FieldWidths` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |读取定宽文本文件Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例读取文件`ParserText.txt`，指定的宽度。 第一列是 5 个字符宽，第二个是 10，第三个为 11，，第四个是宽度可变的This example reads the file `ParserText.txt`, specifying the widths; the first column is 5 characters wide, the second is 10, the third is 11, and the fourth is of variable width [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

exception.span: 除数组最后一个条目外的任意位置中的宽度值小于或等于零。

span.span: A width value in any location other than the last entry of the array is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 指示在分析分隔的文件时是否用引号将字段括起来。

span.span: Denotes whether fields are enclosed in quotation marks when a delimited file is being parsed.

value.span: 如果将字段用引号括起来，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if fields are enclosed in quotation marks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果该属性是`True`，分析器将假定字段用引号 ("")，并且可能包含行尾。If the property is `True`, the parser assumes that fields are enclosed in quotation marks (" ") and may contain line endings. 如果字段括在引号中，例如，`abc, "field2a,field2b", field3`并且此属性是`True`，然后将返回所有文本用引号括起来，因为是; 此示例将返回`abc|field2a,field2b|field3`。If a field is enclosed in quotation marks, for example, `abc, "field2a,field2b", field3` and this property is `True`, then all text enclosed in quotation marks will be returned as is; this example would return `abc|field2a,field2b|field3`. 此属性设置为`False`会使此示例返回`abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`。Setting this property to `False` would make this example return `abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`. ## Examples 此示例设置`HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes`属性设置为`True`为`myReader`。This example sets the `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` property to `True` for `myReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

summary.span: 返回当前行号，如果流中没有更多字符，则返回 -1。

span.span: Returns the current line number, or returns -1 if no more characters are available in the stream.
The current line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 确定的行号时，不忽略空白行和提出的意见。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. ## Examples 此示例中的文本中搜索"Jones"的名称，并报告它所在的行。This example searches for the name "Jones" in the text file and reports what line(s) it occurs on. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string PeekChars(int32 numberOfChars) cil managed
Public Function PeekChars (numberOfChars As Integer) As String

span.span: Number of characters to read.
Required.

summary.span: 读取指定数目的字符但不前移光标。

span.span: Reads the specified number of characters without advancing the cursor.

returns.span: 包含读取的指定数量的字符的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the specified number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `numberOfChars`值必须是一行中的字符总数小于。The `numberOfChars` value must be less than the total number of characters in the line. 如果还没有，返回的字符串`PeekChars`将被截断为行的长度。If it is not, the string returned by `PeekChars` will be truncated to the length of the line. 将忽略空行。Blank lines are ignored. 不返回行结束字符。End-of-line characters are not returned. `PeekChars`方法执行任何分析; 内的分隔字段的行尾字符被解释为实际行的末尾。The `PeekChars` method performs no parsing; an end-of- line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`PeekChars`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `PeekChars` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |在分析之前，确定字段的格式Determine the format of a field before parsing it|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用`PeekChars`查找数据的末尾并停止在该点分析文件。This example uses `PeekChars` to find the end of the data and stop parsing the file at that point. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string[] ReadFields() cil managed

summary.span: 读取当前行的所有字段，以字符串数组的形式返回这些字段，并将光标前进到包含数据的下一行。

span.span: Reads all fields on the current line, returns them as an array of strings, and advances the cursor to the next line containing data.

returns.span: 包含当前行的字段值的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contains field values for the current line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使用户能够分析多种格式的文本文件`ReadFields`方法将检查的值`TextFieldType`， `Delimiters`，和`FieldWidths`，如果指定，则每次调用它。In order to allow users to parse text files in multiple formats, the `ReadFields` method examines the values of `TextFieldType`, `Delimiters`, and `FieldWidths`, if they are specified, each time it is called. 用户需要正确配置`TextFieldType`并`FieldWidths`或`Delimiters`属性，根据需要。Users need to correctly configure the `TextFieldType` and `FieldWidths` or `Delimiters` properties, as appropriate. 如果`TextFieldType`设置为`Delimited`，并`Delimiters`未设置，或者如果`TextFieldType`设置为`FixedWidth`和`FieldWidths`，将引发异常。If `TextFieldType` is set to `Delimited`, and `Delimiters` is not set, or if `TextFieldType` is set to `FixedWidth` and `FieldWidths`, an exception is thrown. 如果`ReadFields`遇到空白行，则跳过并返回下一个非空的行。If `ReadFields` encounters blank lines, they are skipped and the next non-blank line is returned. 如果`ReadFields`方法不能分析当前行时，会引发异常并不会移动到下一行。If the `ReadFields` method cannot parse the current line, it raises an exception and does not move to the next line. 这使你的应用程序以尝试再次分析行。This enables your application to attempt to parse the line again. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`ReadFields`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ReadFields` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文件中读取Read from a delimited file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |从固定宽度文件中读取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例使用`ReadFields`方法以从逗号分隔文件中读取`ParserText.txt`。This example uses the `ReadFields` method to read from the comma-delimited file `ParserText.txt`. 此示例将字段写入 `Testfile.txt`。The example writes the fields to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 不能使用指定格式分析字段。

span.span: A field cannot be parsed by using the specified format.
Associated enumeration: .
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string ReadLine() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 将当前行作为字符串返回，并将光标前进到下一行。

span.span: Returns the current line as a string and advances the cursor to the next line.
The current line from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadLine`方法执行任何分析; 内的分隔字段的行尾字符被解释为实际行的末尾。The `ReadLine` method performs no parsing; an end-of-line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. `Nothing` 如果到达文件末尾返回。`Nothing` is returned if the end of the file is reached. ## Examples 此示例从文件读取`ParserText.txt`并将其写入`Testfile.txt`。This example reads through the file `ParserText.txt` and writes it to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 如果`Testfile.txt`不存在，它由创建`WriteAllText`方法。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method. 此示例中将字段写入作为单个字符串;若要在目标文件中各占一行上显示每个行`VbCrLf`应在每个行的末尾追加字符。This example writes the fields as a single string; to have each line display on its own line in the destination file, a `VbCrLf` character should be appended at the end of each line.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string ReadToEnd() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 读取文本文件的其余部分并作为一个字符串返回。

span.span: Reads the remainder of the text file and returns it as a string.

returns.span: 文件或流中的其余文本。

span.span: The remaining text from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果没有更多要读取，因为已达到文件末尾，`Nothing`返回。If there is nothing more to read because the end of the file has been reached, `Nothing` is returned. `ReadToEnd`方法不会忽略空白行和提出的意见。The `ReadToEnd` method does not ignore blank lines and comments. ## Examples 此示例使用`ReadToEnd`方法来读取整个文件`ParserText.txt`并将其写入到文件`Testfile.txt`。This example uses the `ReadToEnd` method to read the entire file `ParserText.txt` and write it to the file `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 如果`Testfile.txt`不存在，它由创建`WriteAllText`方法。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetDelimiters(string[] delimiters) cil managed
Public Sub SetDelimiters (ParamArray delimiters As String())

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
System.ParamArray

span.span: Array of type .

summary.span: 将读取器的分隔符设为指定的值，并将字段类型设为 。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values, and sets the field type to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 现有内容`Delimiters`时设置此方法，将清除属性。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this method is set. 此方法提供了一种方法，而无需创建一个数组设置分隔符。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`SetDelimiters`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `SetDelimiters` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |分析文本文件Parse a text file|[使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 此示例打开一个文本字段分析器并定义分隔符为`vbTab`。This example opens a text field parser and defines the delimiter as `vbTab`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 将路径为`C:\logs\test.log`使用的路径和你想要分析的文件的名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

span.span: A delimiter is zero-length.

span.span: How to: Read From a Comma-Delimited Text File in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetFieldWidths(int32[] fieldWidths) cil managed
Public Sub SetFieldWidths (ParamArray fieldWidths As Integer())

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
System.ParamArray

span.span: Array of .

summary.span: 将读取器的分隔符设置为指定值。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 现有内容`Delimiters`属性会清除此设置时。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this is set. 此方法提供了一种方法，而无需创建一个数组设置分隔符。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`SetFieldWidths`方法。The following table lists example of tasks involving the `SetFieldWidths` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |分析的文本文件。Parse a text file.|[使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 此示例打开一个文本字段分析器并定义作为字段宽度`5`。This example opens a text-field parser and defines the field width as `5`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 将路径为`C:\logs\test.log`使用的路径和你想要分析的文件的名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse. 下面的示例打开一个文本字段分析器并定义作为字段宽度`5`， `10`，和变量。The following example opens a text-field parser and defines the field widths as `5`, `10`, and variable. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 将路径为`C:\logs\test.log`使用的路径和你想要分析的文件的名称。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

related.span: 使用 TextFieldParser 对象分析文本文件

span.span: Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType TextFieldType { Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType value); };
member this.TextFieldType : Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FieldType with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 指定要分析的文件是分隔的还是固定宽度的。

span.span: Indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

value.span: 一个 值，它指示要分析的文件是分隔的还是固定宽度的。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分隔此属性的默认值。The default value of this property is delimited. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`TextFieldType`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `TextFieldType` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从带分隔符的文本文件中读取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：读取逗号分隔的文本文件How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |读取定宽文本文件Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：读取固定宽度的文本文件How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |读取具有多种格式的文本文件Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：读取具有多种格式的文本文件How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 此示例将创建`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，并指定它分隔。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is delimited. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#19)] 此示例将创建`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，并指定它是固定宽度。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is fixed-width. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 指示是否应移除字段值中的前导和尾随空白。

span.span: Indicates whether leading and trailing white space should be trimmed from field values.

value.span: 如果应移除字段值中的前导和尾随空白，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if leading and trailing white space should be trimmed from field values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `True`。The default value for this property is `True`. ## Examples 此示例将创建`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，并设置`TrimWhiteSpace`属性设置为`True`。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and sets the `TrimWhiteSpace` property to `True`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#7)]
